title: Can't Login !
body:
An unexpected error occurred while loggin in .Please try again,If this issue presist contat support at support.riotgames.com 

Guys i install Hextech and didnt help ,I really want to solve this ,can u help me ? i tried even with my friend acc ,and cant login same thing ...

replies.body: An unexpected error can happen if your network is struggling to reach the authentication server, so it never receives your credentials.  You'll want to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot!  Since you have the HRT, I specifically recommend auto-configuring your firewall settings as an added step.  I hope that helps!

My friend, that is to much for me :) i'll go to youtube guide to finish that problem ,but i am not sure ,that will help :P btw ,thank you so much ,and this started to happens when new patch realesed :)

We have some official Youtube videos [here ](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyi6e6vg93m0VUyI05PGgow)that can help.  I don't recommend unofficial videos because they can be outdated or actually result in causing you more issues than fix. Just be careful, and give those steps a try!
I am sorry if I border u :) but I did all those steps ,from Riot Games Channel on YT  ,and they didnt' help :) i just dont know what to do anymore :P

Not a bother at all, we're here to help!  If the guide didn't work, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can work with you individually.

Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well, which will download some logs to attach to your ticket.  We'll see you there!

I FIXED it ,Listen me guys , Turn of your internet :) Activate your Internet on Mobile ,put portabla wifi hot spot ,connect to your mobile interent ,enter the game ,then just switch back to Your Ethernet Internet :) Have a nice day :*
It happens to me on Tuesday and then on Wednesday, it told me that my account was suspended. I checked email, but didn't receive any information regards to it.
